channel.title: P16 server (need help!)
channel.description:
P16 source got many bugs......do anybody know how to fix it? theese is the bugs: 1:when i talk to wizard mizgog and click countiune it wont go to the next talk menu 2:many of my npc makes me disconect when im trying to trade em.... 3:my moparscape freeze when im trying to use ::bank or use bank both
Please help...

how do this helps me with remowing the bugs?

item.title: P16 server (need help!)
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

Project16 v6 Edit 7
Original Files by Wolf
Edits by Televator0

-----Bugs Fixed-----
Edit 1 Fixes-

  • Fixed Bank adding 99 to each item you deposit
  • Fixed shop so you can’t buy insane stuff
  • Fixed some commands (There were duplicates…)
  • Fixed it so it saves your characters
    -------- Dunno if that was just me, but it would not save characters correctly…
  • Fixed the help menu so it shows all the good commands
  • Uncommented the bank command
    -------- Also made it so only mods and admin’s can use it
  • Fixed a crap load of other commands so users can’t use them
  • Fixed the batch file so it compiles then starts server

Edit 2 Fixes -

  • Fixed more of the commands
  • Fixed the commands so it looks nicer
  • Fixed some items thanks to blackpol
  • Fixed some shops
    -------- Added stuff to the clothes and archery shop in Varrock
  • Fixed some of the autospawn
  • Deleted class files so it’s faster for you to download ^^

Edit 3 Fixes -

  • Fixed all of the commands
  • Edited some of the useless commands out
  • Added tele commands for Mods and Admins only
  • Fixed up the help menus

Edit 4 Fixes -

  • Added full bronze for new players
  • Reverted back to Wolf’s autospawn
    -------- Fixed it up a bit
  • Changed max level to 99
  • Bunch of other stuff I just can’t remember…

Edit 5 Fixes -

  • Fixed the XP to normal! (Credit to KCkeller and my stupidity)
  • Made some stats higher for new characters
    -------- Kinda like goin’ through tut island… but without working ^^

Edit 6 Fixes -

  • Fixed ranging so it’s more accurate (Credit to Kckeller)
  • Added char command back (Credit to Kckeller)
  • Fixed a shit load of shops
  • Fixed almost the entire autospawn
    -------- Deleted all bank npc’s (They don’t really work anyway…)

Edit 7 Fixes -

  • Added a shit load of mobs (Credit to Kckeller)
  • Added a bunch of objects (Credit to kckeller)
  • Added some new tele commands
  • Fixed autospawn some more
  • Fixed npc.cfg a little
  • Fixed some more shops
  • Fixed help menus
    -------- Now it shows Admin/mod Help if you’re an admin/mod
    and you log in.

-----Still To Do-----

  • Add more tele codes for mods
  • Fix up some of the help menus
  • Add teleport NPCs for:
    -------- Thzaar, Barrows, East Ardougne
  • Fix up the Autospawn
  • Organize the Autospawn

-----In-Game Commands-----
Code:
-Basic Commands-
::switch - Switches from Ancient to Regular magic
::pass - Change your password
::char - Allows you to change your appearance
::empty - Empties inventory
::players - Shows people online
::myk - Shows your PK stats
::mystats - Shows your stats
::help - Shows this menu
::mypos- Shows your coordinates
::yell - Say something to everyone on the server
::cw- Teleports you to Castle Wars!

-Menu Commands-
::questmenu - Opens Quest Menu
::slayermenu - Opens Slayer Menu
::theifmenu - Opens Theif Menu
::smeltingmenu - Opens Smelting Menu
::fishingmenu - Opens Fishing Menu
::barrowsmenu - Opens a help menu for the barrows

-Moderator Commands-
::macrowarn - Warn someone about macroing
::bank - Opens your bank
::tele - Teleport to desired coordinates
::teletome - Teleport someone to you
::teleto - Telport to someone
::checkip - Check someone’s IP
::kick - Kick someone off the server
::item - Create an item
::pickup - Creates multiple items
::modhelp - Opens this menu
::pnpc - Turns you into an npc
::unpc - Turns you back to normal

-Tele Commands-
::lumbridge - Go to lumbridge
::varryfarm - Go to the farm before Varrock
::varrock - Go to Varrock
::al-kharid - Go To Al-Kharid
::barbarianvillage - Go to the Barbarian Village
::edgeville - Go to Edgeville
::falador - Go to Falador
::rimmington - Go to Rimmington
::portsarim - Go to Port Sarim
::draynorvillage - Go to Draynor Village
::highleveltraining - Go to a high-level training area
::slayertower - Go to the Slayer Tower
::wildernessdungeon - Go to the Wilderness Dungeon
::tavelrydungeon - Go to the Tavelry Dungeon

-Administrator Commands-
::banuser - Ban someone
::update - Update the server
::reboot - Reboots the server
::kickall - Kicks everyone from the server

----Tutorial-----

Making YOUR Server

  1. First off, go into the java folder.
  2. Then open up “client.java”.
  3. Press ctrl+f and type in “SERVER HERE” (Without quotes).
  4. Hit the “Find Next” button and it should highlight a line that say’s “SERVER NAME”.
  5. Change it to your server’s name.
  6. Hit the “Find Next” button again to find the next one and change it.
  7. Do it until it say’s “Cannot find ‘SERVER NAME’”
  8. Now go to the top of the file and click on the first line of text.
  9. Do the same thing for the “SERVER HERE” except use “ADMIN HERE”
  10. This is where you’ll put your Admin’s name.
  11. Save and exit.
  12. Go all the way back to the main Project16 folder and right click on “Start Server.bat” and go to “Edit”
  13. Edit where it say’s “YOUR SERVER NAME HERE” to your server’s name.
  14. Save and exit.

Becoming An Admin

  1. First open up the server and whatever client you want to use.
  2. Once it’s all booted up, type the username and password you want, and then your LAN IP (127.0.0.1)
  3. Once you are logged in and in Lumbridge, log out and shut down the server and client.
  4. Go into your characters folder and open up the file with your character’s name
  5. Change the line that say’s

Code:
character-rights = 0To

Code:
character-rights = 2OR

Code:
character-rights = 1If you want to be a moderator

  1. Exit out of the file and save it, then hit the back button and go into the folder called “data”.
  2. Open up “administrators.txt” “moderators.txt” and “staff.txt” And add your character’s name to the first line.
  3. Save all of them and have fun.

Getting Max Stats

  1. Go into your “characters” folder and open up your character’s file
  2. Go to the line that say’s “[SKILLS]”
  3. Change that line and everything in the skills field to:

Code:
[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 99 50000000
character-skill = 1 99 50000000
character-skill = 2 99 50000000
character-skill = 3 99 50000000
character-skill = 4 99 50000000
character-skill = 5 99 50000000
character-skill = 6 99 50000000
character-skill = 7 99 50000000
character-skill = 8 99 50000000
character-skill = 9 99 50000000
character-skill = 10 99 50000000
character-skill = 11 99 50000000
character-skill = 12 99 50000000
character-skill = 13 99 50000000
character-skill = 14 99 50000000
character-skill = 15 99 50000000
character-skill = 16 99 50000000
character-skill = 17 99 50000000
character-skill = 18 99 50000000
character-skill = 19 99 50000000
character-skill = 20 99 50000000
character-skill = 21 235 8000000
character-skill = 22 99 50000000
character-skill = 23 99 50000000
character-skill = 24 99 50000000
How To Change Rates

  1. Open “client.java” in your java folder.
  2. Press ctrl+f and type in “* hitdiff” into the box.
  3. It’ll highlight a line with:

Code:

* hitdiff(# representing a real number)

  1. Change the number to whatever you want the rates to be.
  2. Hit the “Find Next” button and continue to change the numbers.
    NOTE: Just change them to the same number so it doesn’t get confusing ^^

DOWNLOAD IT HERE…
http://www.uppit.com/oM3E

NOTE: Have any bugs just post a reply.
Hope it helped you out.
enjoy, tele

Read full topic
